title: Total U.S. hay production 2000 to 2019
summary: In general Production in thousand tons has stayed the same over the Year.
Production in thousand tons is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Production in thousand tons, about 128864.0 was reported at Year 2019
Minimum Production in thousand tons about 123600.0 was reached at Year 2018
